definition: of a mental act, (physics) a short-lived oscillation in a system caused by a sudden change of voltage or current or load
details:
adjective
- of a mental act
= synonyms: transeunt
- lasting a very short time
= synonyms: passing
noun
- (physics) a short-lived oscillation in a system caused by a sudden change of voltage or current or load
- one who stays for only a short time
= example: one who stays for only a short time
